list_definition.definition: a usually round hollow container to hold liquid for drinking, often with a handle
an ornamental vessel, usually of silver or other metal, given as a prize in sports events etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They won the Football League Cup.

list_definition.definition: to form (one’s hands) into the shape of a cup

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He cupped his hands round his mouth and called.

list_definition.definition: to hold (something) in one’s cupped hands

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He cupped the egg in his hands.
